Replace.Text: Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes have an extra +2 points for all types of output, cannot establish [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes with other civilizations, and city expansion speed -20%. All plantation improvements provide +2 [ICON_Science] technology, and this bonus will be doubled for tobacco plantations.

Litang as a questioner: [NEWLINE] Each market will get an additional [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route when it is completed, and each recruited [ICON_GreatMerchant] will get a [ICON_TechBoosted] technology upgrade. [NEWLINE]Litang Modernization Enabler: [NEWLINE]Gives an additional +1 [ICON_Production] Production per hilly tile, +2 [ICON_Production] Production after researching Apprenticeship, and +3 [ICON_Production] Production after researching Industrialization.

Try to synchronize with the junior high school student first in terms of culture, like the civilization whose cultural output per round is lower than his, and hate the civilization with higher cultural output.

Zhen Ding, you are a great pioneer of electronic cigarettes. No matter what age, everyone is still smoking traditional cigarettes, use your innocent smile to impress the people, and promote electronic cigarettes to the world.
A unique unit in the Litang classical era, replacing the rider. At the beginning, it has an upgrade, with higher [ICON_Movement] mobility and higher [ICON_Strength] combat power.
Unique unit of Litang Industrial Era, replacing cavalry. Has a higher vision, will not be debuffed when moving on hills, +8 [ICON_Strength] combat power when fighting on hills.

Litang characteristic area, replacing the commercial center. Can only be built on hills, provides +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins for each adjacent industrial area, and +1 [ICON_Production] production for each adjacent hill. Provides an additional [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant Point per turn. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Once you've researched certain technologies, there are unique items that can be developed in this area.

Litang characteristic building, replacing the stock exchange. Provides +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins and +4 [ICON_Production] production, full power supply requires more electricity, but can provide high gold coins and production when the power supply is sufficient.

Featured projects, carried out in cities with Litang Tobacco Center. It is necessary to complete the "Wang Yuan Capture Plan". After completion, the [ICON_Science] technology bonus brought by all plantations will be removed, and then 15% [ICON_Science] technology bonus will be provided to all cities.

Featured projects, carried out in cities with Litang Tobacco Center. After the completion of the national arrest of Wang Yuan, the defender of traditional cigarettes, all units will get 1 extra [ICON_Movement] movement power, and provide +2 [ICON_Amenities] amenity for each city that has Litang Electronic Cigarette Company.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold coins from adjacent industrial areas.
+8 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting in hilly terrain. [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] is not affected by the [ICON_Movement] movement debuff from hilly terrain.
Hello, my buddy's name is Ding Zhen, welcome to my village to play with Rika.

The Han Dynasty belongs to the White Wolf Land. Sui belongs to Lidou. Tang belongs to Tubo. In the 32nd year of Guangxu in Qing Dynasty (1906), Lihua County was established. In the third year of Xuantong (1911), Zhunzhi Lihua Office governed Daoba, Dingxiang, Hue and other counties. The chieftain system began in the Yuan Dynasty and flourished in the Qing Dynasty. Lihua County was liberated on May 31, 1950, and was renamed Litang County in May of the following year.
However, the world's fame here is largely due to the man with the innocent smile.
“Ladies and gentlemen, ladies and gentlemen, hello, today I am honored to be a child on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau to come to ​Jianhe​ country and tell stories about me and my animal friends.

My village is called Zhanzhika. It is small, but the Genie Mountains and Hengduan Mountains are huge. This world not only belongs to me, but also belongs to my animal friends. There are sambars near my hometown. They are called Hawa in Tibetan, Lawa in Tibetan, and blue sheep in Tibetan. I have encountered them when I was riding and grazing. The wolf is called Shanke in Tibetan, and the Tibetan fox is called Wa in Tibetan. At night, there are snow leopards stepping on the ice and snow, there are eagles in the sky, and there are bugs in the grass.
We Tibetans say that there are 100,000 lives in a drop of water.

I have been studying hard lately, both in books and in nature. I want to tell you that nature can also teach us a lot. I hope that everyone, especially the children, can come to my hometown to learn in nature, and let my wild animal friends teach you.
Today I also brought gifts, which are Litang's environmental protection conventions and nature books, produced by the government and my fellow villagers and colleagues. ​”
Pearl is Ding Zhen's pony and Ding Zhen's mount.
But recently its limelight is about to be taken away by a guy named Snow Leopard. I don't know if it can realize this and defend its position.
Compared with Pearl, Snow Leopard became famous much later, but this does not prevent it from becoming Ding Zhen's favorite pet.
"Even if the enemy is outnumbered, I can take the head of the enemy general with the snow leopard among thousands of troops."
"I often think about who created such a great thing as e-cigarettes? His achievements should be engraved in history forever!"
"If you want to develop a good economy, the tobacco trade is indispensable."
This is indeed the case. If you can achieve a monopoly on tobacco, an addictive substance, you will be able to ingest huge benefits. Numerous vivid examples are strong proofs.
I am willing to smoke the same pipe as you, and we can talk together.
Don't get in my way of making money, you stinky beggar, you're not qualified yet.
Can my sister and brother match me up with my uncle?
The culture should be synchronized with the junior high school students first.
After all, the world cannot tolerate electronic cigarettes.
Unexpectedly, you still prefer traditional cigarettes.
It is a great honor for you to have your delegation come to Litang.
Let me declare here that Litang does not collect garbage.
I want to send a delegation to your country to promote e-cigarettes, can you accept it?
Little Heizi, let me measure your size.
Every second you live with the remnants of traditional cigarettes like you is a waste of air.
Welcome to Litang. After enjoying this beautiful scenery, I think you already know what is great, right?
I didn't expect Litang to have such neighbors, do you want one?
I didn't expect that you also like electronic cigarettes. It's really like-minded.
(Ding Zhen's affection for you has increased)
It's time for you to draw pictures of the remnants of traditional cigarettes like you!
(Ding Zhen's affection for you has decreased)
You should be delighted to have formed a friendly state with Litang.
I can let you go this time.
How about sitting down and smoking one together?
Litang is willing to open the door for you.
Take a look at yourself in the mirror, do you think you deserve it?
Litang needs to borrow your way.
My little pony can overwhelm your armies.
